greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Remainder when the n-th composite number is divided by n.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: Module[{nn=100,cmps,len},cmps=Select[Range[nn],CompositeQ];len=Length[ cmps]; Mod[#[[1]],#[[2]]]&/@Thread[{cmps,Range[len]}]] (* Requires Mathematica version 10 or later *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Mar 29 2020 *)
program: (PARI) Composite(n) = { local(k); k=n + primepi(n) + 1; while (k != n + primepi(k) + 1, k = n + primepi(k) + 1); return(k) } { for (n = 1, 1000, a=Composite(n)%n; write("b065860.txt", n, " ", a) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Nov 02 2009
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Nov 26 2001
